text: thm 'antum ya hwla' yuqtal baedukum bedana, wyukhrj baedukum bedana min dyarhm, wyataqawwa kl fariq minkum ealaa 'iikhwanih balaeda' bghyana wedwanana. wa'ana yatukum asara fi yd al'aeda' seytm fi tahrirahum min alasr, bidafe alfdyt, mae 'anah muharam ealaykum 'iikhrajuhum min dyarhm. ma aqbh ma tafealun hin tuminun bibaed 'ahkam altawrat watakfurun bbedha! falays jaza' man yafeal dhlk minkum 'iilaa dhula wfdyht fi aldnya. wayawm alqiamat yrdduhm allah 'iilaa afze aleadhab fi alnar. wama allah bighafil eamaa temlwn
